Function Documentation

int compute_indpix ( long *&  indpix,
int  factdupl,
int  nn,
long  addnpix,
long *  pixon 
)

compute indpix : pixels indices used for data projection/deprojection. npix is the number of filled pixels Pixon : indicates if the pixel is projected on the map or not addnpix : number of pixels to add : depends on box for CCR and duplication factor

long Compute_indpsrc_addnpix ( int  nn,
long  ntotscan,
std::vector< long >  xxi,
std::vector< long >  xxf,
std::vector< long >  yyi,
std::vector< long >  yyf,
long *&  indpsrc,
long &  npixsrc,
unsigned char *&  mask 
)

compute_indpsrc_addnpix Input : nn : size of the map in pixels ntotscan : total number of scans xxi, xxf, yyi, yyf : box for crossing constraint removal corner coordinates indpsrc : pixel indice of the pixel included in box for CCR npixsrc : total number of pix in box for CCR mask : 0 if the pixel is contained in box for CCR, 1 otherwise
